name: Moonlit Cragstone
desc:
A stone that gives off a strange radiance. It can only be found in a separate part of The Chasm, and its origins and composition are both unknown. However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.

These stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

value.text:
Version 2.7 Event - Perilous Trail
Activity - Realms of Guile and War

customize.name: Crown of Insight
customize.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

customize.name: Moonlit Cragstone
customize.desc:
A stone that gives off a strange radiance. It can only be found in a separate part of The Chasm, and its origins and composition are both unknown. However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.

These stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

customize.name: Glowing Gem
customize.desc:
Specialized refinement material for Fading Twilight.
Cor Lapis delicately refined by ancient arts practiced by the early inhabitants of The Chasm. It glimmers slightly with a light that resembles either the radiance of dawn or the dying twilight. Appearing in caverns where none may see either form of light, it must have brought some small comfort to those who fought against the dark enemy.

customize.name: Moonlit Cragstone
customize.desc:
A stone that gives off a strange radiance. It can only be found in a separate part of The Chasm, and its origins and composition are both unknown. However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.

These stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

customize.name: Lustrous Stone from Guyun
customize.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The learned know that Guyun Stone Forest is far more than simply a miraculous sight on the sea to behold: It is the cemetery of the former gods of Liyue. Hatred and filth have periodically risen up from it, but all have been subdued by a demon-conquering young man.

customize.name: Moonlit Cragstone
customize.desc:
A stone that gives off a strange radiance. It can only be found in a separate part of The Chasm, and its origins and composition are both unknown. However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.

These stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

customize.name: Relic from Guyun
customize.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The stone spear has a glimmering core formed by the power of the defeated gods. Their hatred is not directed at Morax, however, for they have lost themselves a long time ago and are incapable of holding personal grudges.

customize.name: Moonlit Cragstone
customize.desc:
A stone that gives off a strange radiance. It can only be found in a separate part of The Chasm, and its origins and composition are both unknown. However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.

These stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

customize.name: Mist Veiled Mercury Elixir
customize.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
With Fulu (Sigils), the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols, and with Waijing (Sub-Space Creation) they can fashion a cosmic paradise with the power of their minds. The manufacture of elixirs, however, has always been shrouded in mystery, for certain death follows for any who swallow them.

customize.name: Moonlit Cragstone
customize.desc:
A stone that gives off a strange radiance. It can only be found in a separate part of The Chasm, and its origins and composition are both unknown. However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.

These stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

customize.name: Mist Veiled Gold Elixir
customize.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Elixirs are in fact pills made from metal alloys. They were created by the adepti, and are able to grant weapons transcendent powers. However, they are rarely seen in the world due to the hubris of the practitioners of martial arts, who prized the ways of combat over the paths of the adepti.

customize.name: Moonlit Cragstone
customize.desc:
A stone that gives off a strange radiance. It can only be found in a separate part of The Chasm, and its origins and composition are both unknown. However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.

These stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

customize.name: Piece of Aerosiderite
customize.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Rumors of sea monsters are commonplace in Liyue, since the other shore is an unknown region that lies outside of Teyvat. Without the protection of The Seven, all that lies beyond is unknown chaos. Only power beyond the order of Teyvat is able to stain the power of Rex Lapis black.

customize.name: Moonlit Cragstone
customize.desc:
A stone that gives off a strange radiance. It can only be found in a separate part of The Chasm, and its origins and composition are both unknown. However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.

These stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

customize.name: Bit of Aerosiderite
customize.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The coastal nations of Teyvat refer to the region beyond the protection of The Seven as the Dark Sea. It is said that many defeated gods refused to live under the new order of The Seven, so they fled to remote islands and became evil gods. However, their powers came from the same source as Rex Lapis, separate from this all-devouring darkness.

customize.name: Moonlit Cragstone
customize.desc:
A stone that gives off a strange radiance. It can only be found in a separate part of The Chasm, and its origins and composition are both unknown. However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.

These stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

customize.name: Guide to Prosperity
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the promise made by Liyue to its children: To repay the hard-working laborers with enough gold to brighten up this land.

customize.name: Moonlit Cragstone
customize.desc:

However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.

These stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

customize.name: Philosophies of Prosperity
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity is unmatched and unobtainable by any other nations — it all belongs to Liyue and its inhabitants.

customize.name: Moonlit Cragstone
customize.desc:
A stone that gives off a strange radiance. It can only be found in a separate part of The Chasm, and its origins and composition are both unknown. However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.

These stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

customize.name: Guide to Diligence
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is the catalyst that flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold. It is what lies behind the greatness of its great commercial port.

customize.name: Moonlit Cragstone
customize.desc:

However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. customize.name: Philosophies of Diligence
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.

customize.name: Moonlit Cragstone

customize.name: Guide to Gold
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold symbolizes conversion. This is the unspoken understanding between Liyue's mountains, land, city, and people. In Liyue, industriousness is converted into gold, and gold into prosperity.

customize.name: Philosophies of Gold
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold is the wealth of Liyue, but Liyue's true wealth is the hearts of its people that shine like gold.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.
